name: Pipes of Goo
description:
Use pipes to filter out the goo from the water and try to build your pipe as long as you can until the goo inevitably catch up. You can destroy the pipe you've built by clicking at it, as long as no liquid flows through it. Wasting pipes cost points. Try to fill crosses for extra points.

Credits:

  • Yngvarr - code.
  • Syudzius - graphics.

Used assets:

  • Music: In the City by Joshua McLean (via itch, check his music out, its amazing!)
  • Sound Effects:
    • Factory environment mix by jsbarrett
    • explosion_05.wav by derplayer

Tools:

  • PIXI.js for rendering.
  • PIXI-sound for sound.
  • Aseprite & GIMP for graphics.
  • Ocenaudio & Audacity for sound editing.
  • vim for editing code.
  • btw, I use Arch.
